queryParameters.name: api-version
queryParameters.description: Version of the API to be used with the client request. The current version is 2018-01-01-preview.

queryParameters.name: $skiptoken
queryParameters.description:
Page continuation token is only used if a previous operation returned a partial result. 
If a previous response contains a nextLink element, the value of the nextLink element will include a token parameter that specifies a starting point to use for subsequent calls.

queryParameters.name: api-version
queryParameters.description: Version of the API to be used with the client request. The current version is 2018-01-01-preview.

queryParameters.name: $expand
queryParameters.description: The $expand=children query string parameter allows clients to request inclusion of children in the response payload.  $expand=path includes the path from the root group to the current group.

queryParameters.name: $recurse
queryParameters.description: The $recurse=true query string parameter allows clients to request inclusion of entire hierarchy in the response payload. Note that  $expand=children must be passed up if $recurse is set to true.

queryParameters.name: $filter
queryParameters.description: A filter which allows the exclusion of subscriptions from results (i.e. '$filter=children.childType ne Subscription')

queryParameters.name: api-version
queryParameters.description: Version of the API to be used with the client request. The current version is 2018-01-01-preview.
